text:
August 29, 1961
Dr. Maurice FÂ« Seay
Director
Division of Education
W. K. Kellogg Foundation^--
250 Champion Street
Battle Greek, Michigan
Dear Maurice:
This is to acknowledge with gratitude the
receipt of the Foundation's check for $31,335,
which is the last and final payment of our three-
year grant.
At the conclusion of this final year we
will submit a final program report for the
year, together with a financial statement*
Xn addition, we plan to do a special summary
report of the growth ami development of NAEB
over the worse of the eleven years during
which it has enjoyed the Kellogg Foundation's
generous support.
With best personal regards,
Cordially,
William G. Barley
WGH :men
cc: Mr. Richard B. Hull
